left.text: The Gen3 Data Platform (Azure Deployment) is a single web interface running on Microsoft Azure that allows users to discover, access, and analyze data in a secure, cloud-native environment. This deployment demonstrates how Gen3 operates on Azure infrastructure to support scalable data-driven research.

This Azure-based Gen3 platform leverages open-source Gen3 services deployed using Azure cloud resources to support data ingestion, discovery, access control, and analysis workflows. The platform enables the creation and operation of cloud-based data commons and analysis workspaces while taking advantage of Azure scalability, security, and integration capabilities.

quoteArea.quote: Our vision is a world in which researchers have ready access to cloud-hosted data and tools that enable scalable, data-driven discoveries and accelerate scientific progress.
